description: Order of largest (finite) group with n conjugacy classes.
references: E. K. Annavaddar, Determination of the Finite Groups Having Eight Conjugacy Classes. Ph.D. Diss., Arizona State Univ., 1971.
J. Poland, Finite groups with a given number of conjugate classes. Canad. J. Math. 20 1968 456-464.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
A. Vera Lopez and J. Vera Lopez, Classification of finite groups according to the number of conjugacy classes. Israel J. Math. 51 (1985), no. 4, 305-338.
A. Vera Lopez and J. Vera Lopez, Classification of finite groups according to the number of conjugacy classes II. Israel J. Math. 56 (1986), no. 2, 188-221.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
